text: The Australia national under-17 football team represents Australia in youth international football completions. They have FIFA U-17 World Cup 13 times with its best result being runners-up in 1999. ==Competitive record== ===FIFA U-17 World Cup=== FIFA U-17 World Cup record Year Result Position 1985
